title: Process a Return to Vendor (RTV)
description: A shipment of items arrived damaged from the manufacturer and needs to be returned for credit.

tasks.description: Create a new 'Return to Vendor' transaction in the inventory system.
Scan the damaged items and enter the reason for the return ('Damaged in Transit').
tasks.expected_outcome: All items to be returned are accurately recorded on the RTV.

tasks.description: Finalize the RTV, which generates shipping documentation and adjusts the store's inventory.
tasks.expected_outcome: The items are removed from inventory and prepared for shipment back to the vendor.
